name: Wojak This Game
description:
Simple rules apply! Be a Wojak and stay away from any traps! It won't be that simple, though.

Will you be able to get beyond the irksome challenges and terrains that keep appearing in your path?

Control your nerves or don't and die!

Examine your reflexes!

Full with nasty traps and troll background music!

Don't you think you can play better the following time when your Wojak dies?

Lose all your progress, over and over.

Feel new types of frustration you didn't know you were capable of.

There are many traps that will kill you and play with your nerves!

Enjoy a different death every time with exciting ragdoll physics.

Consider how satisfying it would be to overcome each of these obstacles and get The Hidden Treasure.

Be the Wojak who can finish in the least time and with the least death!
